system.effect: The impact crushes flesh and bone. The target drops anything he was holding in that hand, and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d10]] Weapon Skill and [[1d10]] Ballistic Skill damage.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Arm (Severity 4)

The impact crushes flesh and bone. The target drops anything he was holding in that hand, and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer [[1d10]] Weapon Skill and [[1d10]] Ballistic Skill damage.
